Waterproofing Cost Guides

Transparent pricing for Toronto homeowners

Detailed cost breakdowns, factors affecting price, and ways to save on your waterproofing project

Average Cost Ranges

Interior Waterproofing

$3,000 - $8,000

Exterior Waterproofing

$8,000 - $25,000

Foundation Crack Repair

$500 - $3,000

Sump Pump Installation

$1,500 - $3,500

French Drain System

$4,000 - $12,000

Basement Underpinning

$35,000 - $85,000

Factors That Affect Waterproofing Costs

Project Scope

  • • Size of affected area
  • • Severity of water damage
  • • Interior vs. exterior work
  • • Additional repairs needed

Site Conditions

  • • Accessibility of work area
  • • Soil type and conditions
  • • Existing foundation type
  • • Local water table level

Materials & Methods

  • • Quality of materials used
  • • Waterproofing method chosen
  • • Warranty level selected
  • • Additional features (backup pumps, etc.)

Timing & Location

  • • Emergency vs. scheduled work
  • • Seasonal demand fluctuations
  • • Your specific neighborhood
  • • Permit requirements
